text: Cribrihabitans pelagius is a Gram-negative, strictly aerobic, chemoheterotrophic, rod-shaped and motile bacterium from the genus of Cribrihabitans which has been isolated from seawater from the beach of Najeong in Korea. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Cribrihabitans pelagius at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Rhodobacteraceae Category:Bacteria described in 2016
title: Cribrihabitans pelagius
